Pixar USD: Download minimal headers/libs from https://github.com/PixarAnimationStudios/USD
- Place headers in external/usd/include/pxr/
- Place prebuilt libs in external/usd/lib/win64/ (Windows) and external/usd/lib/android/ (ARM64)
- Ensure license.txt is included
- Use minimal config (no Python/imaging) for size
